hours_text:
# Visit

## Hours

**Please note that the Museum will be closed for tours in January.**

When the Museum reopens in February, we will be open Thursday through Sunday.

Thursday through Saturday tours at 10 am, 11 am, and 12 pm.

Sundays at 11 am, 12 pm, and 1 pm.

Confirm availability by clicking “View Dates” to view the tour calendar.

The Museum can be visited through guided tours and museum programs. The Museum is across three floors with no elevator and has one small bathroom. Enjoy the mini-exhibition and gift shop in the lobby while you are here. 

## Admission

  * **$16** \- Adults
  * **$13** \- Seniors (65+)
  * **$8** \- Students
  * **$8** \- Educators
  * **Free** \- Children 12 and under
  * **Free** \- Members
  * **Free** \- Active duty military personnel, plus up to five family members, in collaboration with [NEA Blue Star Museums](http://arts.gov/national/blue-star-museums)
  * **Free** \- [Mass Cultural Council's Card to Culture program](https://massculturalcouncil.org/organizations/card-to-culture/) : EBT, WIC, SUN Bucks, and ConnectorCare cardholders receive free admission (2 per card)
  * **Free** \- NARM Members
  * **Free** \- Staff of other museums with ID (2 per ID)

### Discounts

[ ](https://narmassociation.org/)

We are proud to be a NARM member institution. NARM members receive free admission when visiting our site. To become a NARM member through the Nichols House Museum visit the membership section of our website. To learn more visit the [ NARM...

collections_text:
# Welcome to the Nichols House Museum

19th-Century House, 20th-Century Family, 21st-Century Ideas

# [Donate to the Annual Fund Support the preservation of the Museum  ](https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=49HLUG3DERBH4)

# [Upcoming Programs and Events Explore our calendar of programs and events ](https://www.nicholshousemuseum.org/programs-and-events/)

## Membership at the Nichols House

Our members provide essential funding for the Museum, ensuring the preservation of 55 Mount Vernon Street and its collection for generations to come.

Join today to receive free admission, discounts, and more! 

[Learn about Membership ](https://www.nicholshousemuseum.org/membership/)

### About Us

The Nichols House Museum is a historic home located in Boston’s Beacon Hill neighborhood. Visitors are welcome for tours, programs and special events throughout the year. We highlight topics such as women’s history, decorative arts, and everyday life through stories of the Nichols family and their contemporaries in late 19th century and early 20th century Boston. 

[Read More](https://www.nicholshousemuseum.org/about/)

### Visit

55 Mount Vernon Street  
Boston, MA 02108  [ 617-227-6993 ](tel:1-617-227-6993)

****

[Book](https://fareharbor.com/embeds/book/nicholshousemuseum/items/221728/?full-items=yes&flow=376571)
